testcase.name: status.js hook file exists and is readable
parse-hook-events.js parser exists and is executable
run-hook-test.sh harness exists and is executable
status hook reports hookEventName as SubagentStop
status hook outputs valid JSON with hookSpecificOutput
status hook output contains timestamp
status hook always exits with code 0 (non-blocking)
status hook emits 'verified' when implement.json recently modified
status hook emits 'session_cleared' when session_id present
status hook emits 'unchanged' when implement.json not recently modified
status hook emits 'disabled' when STATUS_HOOK_DISABLE=1
status hook reads implement.json correctly
status hook finds .trd-state from nested directory
status hook handles multiple implement.json files
status hook emits 'no_state' when .trd-state directory missing
status hook emits 'no_files' when .trd-state exists but empty
status hook emits 'no_files' when subdirectories lack implement.json
status hook handles corrupt JSON gracefully (incomplete JSON)
status hook handles corrupt JSON gracefully (not JSON at all)
status hook handles empty implement.json
status hook handles binary content in implement.json
status hook outputs debug info to stderr when STATUS_HOOK_DEBUG=1
status hook does not output debug info when STATUS_HOOK_DEBUG unset
status hook clears session_id and sets last_session_completed
status hook preserves other data when clearing session_id
status hook uses process.cwd() when cwd not in input
status hook handles empty stdin gracefully
LIVE: status hook fires during real SubagentStop event
testcase.skipped: Live tests disabled (set SKIP_LIVE_TESTS=false to enable)
